abilities.name: Empowered Attacks.
abilities.description: Olhydra's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical weapons.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Olhydra's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: wall of ice
* 3/day: ice storm
* 1/day: storm of vengeance

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If Olhydra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: Olhydra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Water Form.
abilities.description: Olhydra can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. She can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
